summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5520 for the improvement of West Howe Street, from 28th Avenue West to 26th Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 70669, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
